answers.answer: High blood  pressure,  baby  isn't growing anymore inside you, a "big" baby, you want the baby out lol.
They induced me at 40weeks because my daughter looked small she weighed 6lb
I just asked my doctor at 38 weeks and he induced me 39+2. No medical reason
I find out in a day or two if I need to be due to pre Pre Eclampsia. I'm only 32 weeks. :/ Hoping things turn around!
I was at 37+2 because I had preeclampsia.
I was overdue with my first pregnancy do they induced me didn't help tho

I was induced with my first two baby's and prob will be with this one to. I have been high risk with all 3. With my first baby I had high fluid with baby and they were concerned about me not gaining enough weight. baby #2 again concerned about not gaining enough weight an I had a short cervix. Baby's were very healthy.
With my first I was induced at 37 weeks due to ICP(cholestasis) they're monitoring me this time to see if I have it again. My sons completely healthy though. Didn't have any complications at all
I was induced at 35 weeks due to preeclampsia

question: Why are or have you ladies been induced before?
